Name: Chutes & Ladders cocktail
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and discard.
Review: Citrusy tequila-led with Swedish punch and Cocchi Americano rounding and adding their distinctive flavours.
History: Adapted from a drink created in 2014 by Frederic Yarm at Russell House Tavern in Cambridge, Massachusetts.
Nutrition: One serving of Chutes & Ladders cocktail contains 251 calories
